text: Joely Richardson (born 9 January 1965) is an English actress. She played Margrete in Shining Through. She also played Christine in I'll Do Anything. She is the younger daughter of actress Vanessa Redgrave. She was born in London, England. ==References== Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:1965 births Category:Living people
title: Joely Richardson
